select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_customer_qna
order by re_group desc, re_seq asc) a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_customer_qna(c_no, c_title, c_content, c_date, c_id, re_group) values(#{c_no}, #{c_title}, #{c_content}, sysdate, #{c_id}, #{c_no})

insert into tbl_customer_qna(c_no, c_title, c_content, c_date, c_id, re_group, re_seq, re_level) values(seq_qna_no.nextval, #{c_title}, #{c_content}, sysdate, #{c_id}, #{re_group}, #{re_seq}+1, #{re_level}+1)

choose.when: where c_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or c_content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
